query:
WITH RECURSIVE folder_tree AS (
            SELECT id, fk_parent
            FROM folders
            WHERE id = $1 AND fk_owner = $2
            UNION
            SELECT f.id, f.fk_parent
            FROM folders f
            JOIN folder_tree ft ON f.fk_parent = ft.id
        )
        DELETE FROM folders
        WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM folder_tree) AND id <> $3;
